issue.title: [Python] Remove direct usage of pandas' Block subclasses
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12057](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12057). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `CategoricalBlock` was removed in pandas (https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/40527), which breaks the nightly tests. 

I will argue in pandas to add it back on the short term (https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/40226#issuecomment-804903010), but we should still remove the direct use of those Block subclasses in pyarrow.
